DOC.brief_summary: A Prospective , Randomized , Multi-Center Comparison Cypher Select™ Sirolimus-Eluting Stent Balloon Re-Angioplasty Treatment Patients Intra-Des Restenosis .
DOC.brief_title: The Intra-Drug Eluting Stent ( DES ) Restenosis Study
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize study conduct 33 site France 3 group patient ( 1 group intra-Taxus™ restenosis , 1 group intra-Cypher™ restenosis 1 control group intra-BMS restenosis ) . All patient repeat angiography 9 12 month post-procedure follow 12 month post-procedure .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis angina pectoris define Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification ( CCS I , II , III , IV ) OR unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald Classification B & C , IIIIII ) OR patient document silent ischemia ; Patient intraDES ( TAXUS™ OR CYPHER™ ) intraBMS restenosis > = 50 % < 100 % ( QCA online MLD compare distal reference diameter ) native coronary artery ; Study target lesion must locate restenotic native coronary artery > =2.25mm < =3.5mm lumen diameter < =30mm length visual estimate within region 5mm proximal/distal stent edge ; Study target lesion must undergo coronary interventional treatment > = 4 week previously . Patients one ore prior PTCA procedure target lesion acceptable candidate . Study target lesion locate vessel contain another lesion require treatment . Lesions locate vessel may treat percutaneous revascularization time procedure , BUT must successfully treat prior treatment study target lesion ; Patient candidate current percutaneous revascularisation technique ; Patient willing comply specify followup evaluation ( include angiographic followup ) ; Patient must provide write informed consent prior procedure use form approve local Ethics Committee ; Patient experience Qwave nonQwave myocardial infarction document total CK > 2 time normal within precede 72 hour CK enzymes remain normal time treatment ; Has unstable angina classify Braunwald A IIIIII ; Unprotected leave main coronary disease ³50 % stenosis ; Significant ( > 50 % ) stenoses additional lesion proximal distal target lesion ( ) might require revascularization impede runoff ; Target lesion internal mammary artery , saphenous vein bypass graft locate leave main ostial ; Stent implantation ( ) nonelective , emergency procedure ; Stent target restenosed lesion neither TAXUS™ , CYPHER™ DES BMS ; Documented leave ventricular ejection fraction < =25 % ; Totally occlude vessel ( TIMI 0 level ) .
